sources.description:
Racing against time and law in a high-speed chase for justice.
A framed man escapes prison and takes a wealthy womanâ€™s Jaguar with her in it. After she tries to escape numerous times, they begin to develop feelings for each other, and enter a road race that ends in Mexico.

Original title: The Fast and the Furious (1954) 

Black & White version: https://youtu.be/lq49P3C2fmQ

Directors: John Ireland, Edward Sampson 
Writers: Jerome Odlum, Jean Howell 
Stars: John Ireland, Dorothy Malone, Bruce Carlisle 
Genres: Classics, Crime, Drama, Mystery, Romance, Thriller
Budget: $66,000
